mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (name, email, createdAt, socialID, profileURL,age, position, height, weight) VALUES(#{name}, #{email}, #{createdAt}, #{socialID}, #{profileURL}, #{age}, #{position}, #{height}, #{weight})
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET email=#{email}, name = #{name}, age = #{age}, position = #{position}, height = #{height}, weight = #{weight} WHERE userID = #{userID}
UPDATE user SET profileURL=#{uniqueFileName} WHERE userID=#{userID}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM user WHERE name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
